title: Pixel 5 Bedtime doesn't turn off Do Not Disturb in morning.
content:
Just got my Pixel 5 a few days ago. I setup Bedtime from 10pm to 6am. Bedtime turns on just fine, I even like the "everything turns black/white", but when Bedtime turns off at 6am the DnD does not turn off.
Very frustrating that I have to manually enable notifications every morning.
